column4: this OS is a POS, it keeps crashing, freezing, glitching etc. for me
what's the matter - I just had everything freeze in a row
I'm just trying to do my job
by freeze I mean even the cursor doesn't move
that was this time, but other times I get freezes where the cursor does move
that is the most sever issue, but everything else regarding Xorg and compiz is behaving badly too
going to standby causes my multi monitor settings to be reset or recovered
meaning I need to close and open my laptop lid twice so the second monitor wold work
and when the multi monitor settings are reset, all the windows are pushed into the one monitor, sometimes out of view
